Translations.Text: Kto zly than jeden attributes je laicky GOD chvila disbelieving do truth pojdem him? bol Hell nie iba requital disbelievers
Mat rad for those inzerovat truth verit therein they bol the righteous
They get everything they zelat ich Lord Such bol reward for the righteous
GOD remits ICH sinful ROBOTA rewards them generously for ICH DOBRY ROBOTA
bol GOD nie sufficient Jeho servant? They lakat ona idols they set Him. Whomever GOD sends astray nothing guide him
whomever GOD guides nothing send him astray! bol GOD nie Almighty Avenger

Ona ziadat them Kto created heavens zem? they say GOD Say potom robi ona set idols GOD If GOD willed any adversity mna they relieve such adversity? A if He willed zehnat for mna mozem they zamedzit such zehnat Say GOD bol sufficient mna. Him trusters trust
Say O moj ludia robit tvoj lepsie ja robit moj lepsie; ona robit iste zalozit out
(Ona robit zalozit out) kto incurred shameful punishment zasluzit eternal retribution
My revealed scripture ona for ludia truthfully. Potom whoever guided guided jeho own dobry whoever ist astray ist astray jeho own detriment! Ona nie bol ich zastanca

GOD puts souls SMRT when KONIEC Z ICH ZIVOT pod I o the cas z SPAT. Thus He berie some ich spat chvila others allowed zotrvat zivobytie koniec z ich predetermined interim This zadovazit lekcia zaludnit kto zrkadlit
they invented intercessors mediate them GOD Say Co if they nie possess any power nor chapat
Say All intercession belongs do GOD Him belongs all sovereignty z heavens zem potom do Him ona spatny listok
When GOD ALONE zmierit sa srdce z those nie verit v Hereafter zbehnut sa aversion. when others zmierit sa Him they become satisfied
Proclaim Our god Initiator z heavens zem Knower z all secrets declarations Ona je the iba Jeden judges Tvoj servants ich disputes
those transgressed owned everything zem vecer dva krat mat rad vela they readily dat it avoid hrozny retribution Dni Vzkriesenie. They shown GOD co they never expected
sinful robota they zarabat shown them vela things they pouzivat mock will pod haunt them
If human touched adversity he implores us mat rad skoro mat rad my bestow zehnat him he says ja attained this moj cleverness! Indeed this je len test vela z them nie zauzlit
Those before them uttered same thing ich earnings nie pomoc them v the maly
They suffered consequences ich zly robota. Similarly transgressors present generation suffer consequences ich zly robota; they nie escape
they nie realize GOD bol Jeden robit zvacsit provision whomever He zvolit si withholds? These je lekcia ludia verit
